scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:ExceptionsPanel_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
#set ($exceptionsListId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('exceptionsList')) #set ($filterId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('filter')) #set ($exceptionCountId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('exceptionCount')) #set ($deleteSelectedId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('deleteSelected')) #set ($deleteAllId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('deleteAll')) #set ($exportId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('export')) #set ($headerContentId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('headerContent')) #set ($deselectAllId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('deselectAll')) #set ($searchInputId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('searchInput')) #set ($machineNamesId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('machineNames')) #set ($exceptionTypeId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('ExceptionTypeId')) #set ($initialStartDate = $core_v2_utility.CurrentUserDate.AddDays(-1)) #set ($options = "%{ StartDate = '$initialStartDate' }") #set ($categoryIds = $context_exceptions.ListTypes($options))

$core_v2_language.GetResource('Instructions')

$core_v2_language.GetResource('with') #set ($machineNames = $context_exceptions.ListMachineNames()) #if($machineNames.Count >= 2) $core_v2_language.GetResource('on') #end $core_v2_language.GetResource('between') $core_v2_language.GetResource('and') $core_v2_language.GetResource('Refresh')

    #set ($inProcess = true) #set ($options = "%{ StartDate = '$initialStartDate', IncludeUnknown = 'true', SortBy = 'LastOccurred', PageSize = 20, PageIndex = 0 }") #set ($exceptions = $context_exceptions.List($options)) $core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('render-list.vm')
scriptedContentFragment.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="and">and</resource> <resource name="between">that occurred between</resource> <resource name="cancel">Cancel</resource> <resource name="containing">containing</resource> <resource name="Delete">Delete</resource> <resource name="DeleteAll">Delete All</resource> <resource name="DeleteAllConfirm">Are you sure you want to delete all logged exceptions?</resource> <resource name="DeleteConfirm">Are you sure you want to delete this exception?</resource> <resource name="DeleteSelected">Delete Selected</resource> <resource name="DeleteSelectedConfirm">Are you sure you want to delete the selected exceptions?</resource> <resource name="DeselectAll">Deselect All</resource> <resource name="Exceptions_Plural">{0} Exceptions</resource> <resource name="Exceptions_Singular">{0} Exception</resource> <resource name="ExceptionsPanel_Description">View logged exceptions.</resource> <resource name="ExceptionsPanel_Name">Exceptions</resource> <resource name="Export">Export</resource> <resource name="ExportAll">Export All</resource> <resource name="ExportSelected">Export Selected</resource> <resource name="FirstOccurred">First Occurred</resource> <resource name="Instructions">Below is a listing of exceptions occuring throughout the site. To view exceptions related only to specific functionality, review the 'Exceptions' tab when administering that functionality.</resource> <resource name="IPAddress">IP Address</resource> <resource name="LastOccurred">Last Occurred</resource> <resource name="MinFrequency_All">any number of occurrences</resource> <resource name="MinFrequency_Occurrences">{0} or more occurrences</resource> <resource name="more">More</resource> <resource name="Node_Any">any node</resource> <resource name="NoExceptions">No exceptions match the filter.</resource> <resource name="NoMatchingTypes">No matches found.</resource> <resource name="Occurrences">{0} Times</resource> <resource name="on">on</resource> <resource name="Referrer">Referrer</resource> <resource name="Refresh">Refresh</resource> <resource name="Request">Request</resource> <resource name="Server">Server</resource> <resource name="SortBy_Frequency">by total occurrences</resource> <resource name="SortBy_LastOccurred">by last occurred date</resource> <resource name="TotalOccurrences">Total Occurrences</resource> <resource name="Type_All">All exceptions</resource> <resource name="UserAgent">User Agent</resource> <resource name="with">with</resource> </language>
